info.description: Azure Application Insights client for web test based alerting.
info.title: ApplicationInsightsManagementClient

get.description: Get all Application Insights web test alerts definitions within a subscription.

200.description: A list of 0 or more Application Insights web test definitions.

schema.description: A list of 0 or more Application Insights web test definitions.

nextLink.description: The link to get the next part of the returned list of web tests, should the return set be too large for a single request. May be null.

value.description: Set of Application Insights web test definitions.

items.description: An Application Insights web test definition.

kind.description: The kind of web test that this web test watches. Choices are ping and multistep.

properties.description: Metadata describing a web test for an Azure resource.

Configuration.description: An XML configuration specification for a WebTest.

WebTest.description: The XML specification of a WebTest to run against an application.

Description.description: Purpose/user defined descriptive test for this WebTest.

Enabled.description: Is the test actively being monitored.

Frequency.description: Interval in seconds between test runs for this WebTest. Default value is 300.

Kind.description: The kind of web test this is, valid choices are ping and multistep.

Locations.description: A list of where to physically run the tests from to give global coverage for accessibility of your application.

items.description: Geo-physical location to run a web test from. You must specify one or more locations for the test to run from.

Id.description: Location ID for the webtest to run from.

Name.description: User defined name if this WebTest.

RetryEnabled.description: Allow for retries should this WebTest fail.

SyntheticMonitorId.description: Unique ID of this WebTest. This is typically the same value as the Name field.

Timeout.description: Seconds until this WebTest will timeout and fail. Default value is 30.

provisioningState.description: Current state of this component, whether or not is has been provisioned within the resource group it is defined. Users cannot change this value but are able to read from it. Values will include Succeeded, Deploying, Canceled, and Failed.

Configuration.WebTest: <WebTest Name="my-webtest" Id="678ddf96-1ab8-44c8-9274-123456789abc" Enabled="True" CssProjectStructure="" CssIteration="" Timeout="120" WorkItemIds="" xmlns="http://microsoft.com/schemas/VisualStudio/TeamTest/2010" Description="" CredentialUserName="" CredentialPassword="" PreAuthenticate="True" Proxy="default" StopOnError="False" RecordedResultFile="" ResultsLocale=""><Items><Request Method="GET" Guid="a4162485-9114-fcfc-e086-123456789abc" Version="1.1" Url="http://my-component.azurewebsites.net" ThinkTime="0" Timeout="120" ParseDependentRequests="True" FollowRedirects="True" RecordResult="True" Cache="False" ResponseTimeGoal="0" Encoding="utf-8" ExpectedHttpStatusCode="200" ExpectedResponseUrl="" ReportingName="" IgnoreHttpStatusCode="False" /></Items></WebTest>

<WebTest Name="342bccf4-722f-496d-b064-123456789abc" Id="00a15cc1-c903-4f97-9af4-123456789abc" Enabled="False" CssProjectStructure="" CssIteration="" Timeout="120" WorkItemIds="" xmlns="http://microsoft.com/schemas/VisualStudio/TeamTest/2010" Description="" CredentialUserName="" CredentialPassword="" PreAuthenticate="True" Proxy="default" StopOnError="False" RecordedResultFile="" ResultsLocale=""><Items><Request Method="GET" Guid="347e1924-9899-4c6e-ad78-123456789abc" Version="1.1" Url="http://my-other-component.azurewebsites.net" ThinkTime="0" Timeout="120" ParseDependentRequests="True" FollowRedirects="True" RecordResult="True" Cache="False" ResponseTimeGoal="0" Encoding="utf-8" ExpectedHttpStatusCode="200" ExpectedResponseUrl="" ReportingName="" IgnoreHttpStatusCode="False" /></Items></WebTest>

tags.Test: You can delete this synthetic monitor anytime

get.description: Get all Application Insights web tests defined for the specified component.

parameters.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.
parameters.name: componentName

parameters.description: The name of the resource group.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

200.description: A list containing 0 or more web test definitions.

schema.description: A list of 0 or more Application Insights web test definitions.

nextLink.description: The link to get the next part of the returned list of web tests, should the return set be too large for a single request. May be null.

value.description: Set of Application Insights web test definitions.

items.description: An Application Insights web test definition.

kind.description: The kind of web test that this web test watches. Choices are ping and multistep.

properties.description: Metadata describing a web test for an Azure resource.

Configuration.description: An XML configuration specification for a WebTest.

WebTest.description: The XML specification of a WebTest to run against an application.

Description.description: Purpose/user defined descriptive test for this WebTest.

Enabled.description: Is the test actively being monitored.

Frequency.description: Interval in seconds between test runs for this WebTest. Default value is 300.

Kind.description: The kind of web test this is, valid choices are ping and multistep.

Locations.description: A list of where to physically run the tests from to give global coverage for accessibility of your application.

items.description: Geo-physical location to run a web test from. You must specify one or more locations for the test to run from.

Id.description: Location ID for the webtest to run from.

Name.description: User defined name if this WebTest.

RetryEnabled.description: Allow for retries should this WebTest fail.

SyntheticMonitorId.description: Unique ID of this WebTest. This is typically the same value as the Name field.

Timeout.description: Seconds until this WebTest will timeout and fail. Default value is 30.

provisioningState.description: Current state of this component, whether or not is has been provisioned within the resource group it is defined. Users cannot change this value but are able to read from it. Values will include Succeeded, Deploying, Canceled, and Failed.

Configuration.WebTest: <WebTest Name="my-webtest" Id="678ddf96-1ab8-44c8-9274-123456789abc" Enabled="True" CssProjectStructure="" CssIteration="" Timeout="120" WorkItemIds="" xmlns="http://microsoft.com/schemas/VisualStudio/TeamTest/2010" Description="" CredentialUserName="" CredentialPassword="" PreAuthenticate="True" Proxy="default" StopOnError="False" RecordedResultFile="" ResultsLocale=""><Items><Request Method="GET" Guid="a4162485-9114-fcfc-e086-123456789abc" Version="1.1" Url="http://my-component.azurewebsites.net" ThinkTime="0" Timeout="120" ParseDependentRequests="True" FollowRedirects="True" RecordResult="True" Cache="False" ResponseTimeGoal="0" Encoding="utf-8" ExpectedHttpStatusCode="200" ExpectedResponseUrl="" ReportingName="" IgnoreHttpStatusCode="False" /></Items></WebTest>

tags.Test: You can delete this synthetic monitor anytime

delete.description: Deletes an Application Insights web test.

parameters.description: The name of the resource group.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.description: The name of the Application Insights webtest resource.
parameters.name: webTestName

200.description: Successful request to delete a web test definition.

204.description: No content: the request was successful, but the response is empty (the request to delete failed because the specified web test does not exist).
